item.description:
Upcoming Events

Friday, Film Night: HER

📅 Friday, 28th February
📍 Juridicum, Lunds Universitet
🔗 Sign up here: Google Form

We will be watching the Oscar award-winning film “Her”, directed by Spike Jonze and starring Joaquin Phoenix and Scarlett Johansson. Her is a unique love story exploring friendship and romance in the world of artificial intelligence. Her is a classic film that will appeal to everyone, regardless of your level of interest in artificial intelligence! While the film is set in the future, it’s an especially intriguing movie to watch when you consider the current development of AI chatbots. We’re sure you’ll agree that it’s a great way to spend a cosy Friday evening, so come along after class, bring a pal, and your favourite movie snack!

Get active in the Hub!

  • We offer free membership for all students at Lund University. Register here.
  • You can also get active in the committee team, shape the future of Hub AI, expand your network, and develop professional and soft skills! Hub AI is growing and wants you on board for this exciting journey! Read more and apply here.
